```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(phyloseq)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
# Import OTU table and taxonomy from BIOM
phy <- import_biom("data/16S/processed/feature-table-taxon.biom")

# Add sample data
sample_data(phy) <- read.delim("data/16S/sample_metadata.txt", row.names = 1)

# Transform counts to relative abundance
phy <- transform_sample_counts(phy, function(x) x/sum(x))
```

```{r}
plot_bar(phy, fill = "OTU") + 
  facet_wrap(sym ~ trt, scales = "free") + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")

plot_bar(phy, fill = "OTU") + 
  facet_wrap(~ colony, scales = "free") + 
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
